mapper.insert: insert into tour_info_board (title, writer_id, content, sido_code, gugun_code) values (#{title}, #{writerId}, #{content}, #{sidoCode}, #{gugunCode})
mapper.select:
select b.*, sg.sido_name, sg.gugun_name from (select s.sido_code, s.sido_name, g.gugun_code, g.gugun_name from sido s join gugun g on s.sido_code = g.sido_code) sg join tour_info_board b on sg.sido_code = b.sido_code and sg.gugun_code = b.gugun_code
b.sido_code=#{sidoCode} and b.gugun_code=#{gugunCode} and b.title like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
order by b.post_id DESC
mapper.update: update tour_info_board set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, sido_code=#{sidoCode}, gugun_code=#{gugunCode}, update_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where post_id = #{postId}
